TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute abstract : Attribute

summary.span: 添付プロパティの使用範囲を報告する .NET Framework 属性の基底クラスを提供します。

span.span: Provides a base class for .NET Framework attributes that report the use scope of attached properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用語の意味`browsable`この説明で使用されている[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)](と派生クラス) の指定された説明に似ています、添付プロパティの参照可能な状態は特に関連するプロパティが、情報を[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]で添付プロパティは、主にあるため、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念です。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] (and derived classes) is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept.
